title: What is your memories of school and childhood? - Quora

response.answer_text: My school life started when I was 4years old…I hated to go to school…I used to cry a lot and give many excuses like stomachache etc . During my childhood till class 9th I loved to play with dolls …they were my favorite. I had decorated a corner in my home with my dolls and other toys like toy gas and utensils etc. In my school time I was a known child in my school that is my teachers knew me very well…I was a little straight forward so the boys in my class were afraid of my a little. I had slapped a class 5th boy when I was in class 6th as he commented on my skirt …he was older than me in age. Once I scored 7marks in 25 during a weekly test of maths for which I cried a lot when I came home . I had a very good friend named Manisha when I was in class 6th but as if changed my school we lost contact. I was non-schooling student during 11–12th.. I was in an all girls coaching classes when I met NEHA my one and only best friend . During my childhood I was very naughty..I used to fight with my siblings. Thanks for reading. Keep growing.

I have lots of happy memories, I don't know what specifically your question is about, I remember the time during summer vacation we use to go to our grandparent's place and all our cousins use to come over as well. We used to tell stories to each other and enjoy a lot. I remember my grandmother has asked everyone of to study for 2 hrs daily and all my cousins including me use to sit at 7pm to 9pm together and trying to studying and ending up gossiping or dozing off. As my father has a transferable job, I had to change my school every 3 year and to go a different place, make new friends. I didn't like that then but now I enjoy moving to a new place. I love dancing and singing, I used to always participate in every co curricular activity in my school. I'm was the teacher's favourite student. I was good in academics also in school.
